page.title: 15LIFE IN ST COLUMB MINOR
page.content: The church is very old and is the oldest part of St.Columb Minor.The grave yard is nearly full and they are using another cemetery nearby. The vicar at this church also serves the Colan area St.Columb Minor has a public park which was recently created.There are swings, a rocking horse,slide and climbing frames provided,which makes an exellent focility for the children living in the nearby RAF quarters. Adjoining these quarters there are some older houses that were built in 1930,but there are newer houses at the top of Leader Road.They were built in 1970.Many houses which were previously rented from the Council have now been bought by the tenants in line with recent goverment policy.In summer time wildflowers include foxgloves,dogroses brambles,honeysuckle and cornflowers.
